data.name: Maze Mart Demo
data.detailed_description: Maze Mart's game demo, introduces you to the game universe with some main game's mechanics such as the search for collectables and two different possible endings present in the final version of the game. (One is slightly modified to fit the demo).
data.about_the_game: Maze Mart's game demo, introduces you to the game universe with some main game's mechanics such as the search for collectables and two different possible endings present in the final version of the game. (One is slightly modified to fit the demo).
data.short_description: Maze Mart's game demo, introduces you to the game universe with some main game's mechanics such as the search for collectables and two different possible endings present in the final version of the game. (One is slightly modified to fit the demo).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
